wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Renwick Macaulay (30 July 1915 – 10 June 1993) was a Scottish football player and manager.

response: :Frank Swift (England), George Hardwick (England), Billy Hughes (Wales), Archie Macaulay (Scotland), Jackie Vernon (Ireland), Ron Burgess (Wales), Stanley Matthews (England), Wilf Mannion (England), Tommy Lawton (England), Billy Steel (Scotland), Billy Liddell (Scotland).
